data.name: Psychoscopy
data.detailed_description:
Your purpose in this game is finding evidences and taking videos of paranormal activities to share on your website named ‘Psychoscopy’. You have different types of equipments to detect specific activities for finding haunted areas and gather evidences of these existences. Your exploration team checks the place before you reach the destination and gives you some information about it. You earn your life with sharing the videos and the evidences of paranormal activities on your website.

  • In Psychoscopy, there are 20+ unique existences in 4 different categories.
  • These are; ghosts, spirits, daemons and mytical beings.
  • All of them have unique defense methods that helps you to defend yourselves while looking for an evidence.



You can contribute to the development of the game by coming to our Steam community or our Discord channel and sharing your suggestions or opinions with us.

PROTECT YOURSELF


You will find yourselves in the middle of the different existences. You have to know which creature you are dealing before chosing the defense method. While these methods helps you to defend yourselves against some creatures, they can make others angry.

TALK TO THEM


Some of the beings may want to talk with you, you can contact with them, ask them questions, tell them to do some activities or maybe talk with them by using an ouija board.

LARGE MAPS


The places you will search have large lands. There are many places worth to visit, but it can be hard to find your way. You should read your exploration team’s hints carefully and check the map frequently that is given to you by them. You and your 4 friends should choose where you check wisely because not all the places have paranormal activities.

SPECIAL CHARACTERS


You can unlock the new unique characters and better equipments by earning more money in this game.

data.short_description: Psychoscopy is a 5 player co-op horror game that you try to gather evidences about paranormal activities in large areas. Make a team with your 4 friends, take your equipments and hunt down paranormal activities.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5-4690K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050ti / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5-4690K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050ti / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
